thread.title: Juventus loses midfielders Pereyra and Asamoah to injury
thread.title_full: Juventus loses midfielders Pereyra and Asamoah to injury

title: Juventus loses midfielders Pereyra and Asamoah to injury
text:
Juventus midfielder Pereyra sidelined for 40 days, Asamoah out with fresh injury setback THE ASSOCIATED PRESS First Posted: October 26, 2015 - 1:00 pmLast Updated: October 26, 2015 - 1:01 pm We also have more stories about: (click the phrases to see a list) 
People: 
Italy (124) 

TURIN, Italy — Juventus midfielder Roberto Pereyra will be sidelined for more than a month with a muscular problem, and teammate Kwadwo Asamoah has had another injury setback. 
Pereyra went off in the 37th minute of Juventus' 2-0 win over Atalanta after pulling up clutching his hamstring and the team says tests "revealed a second-grade tear" in his right thigh. 
Juventus says the Argentina midfielder will be out for about 40 days. 
Asamoah - who replaced Pereyra on Sunday - will likely return to action in 20 days following "a first-grade tear" in his left thigh. 
Asamoah missed most of last season with knee problems and had only made one appearance this season prior to Sunday's win.
